Yonkers.Haworth Public Schools:
The Haworth Public Schools are a community public school district, serving students in kindergarten through eighth grade from Haworth, in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its one school had an enrollment of 666 students and 38.7 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 17.2:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "I," the second-highest of eight groupings.
